attributes.action: Add a bitterant to ALL Glycol preparations & warning labels/ingredients on their containers
attributes.additional_details:
Ban all (ethylene & propylene) glycol preparations: antifreeze/coolant/screenwashes unless they contain a bittering agent & labels clearly marked with hazard warnings & ingredients.

BDOU are backed by RSPCA,WAF etc who are campaigning to make it safer to wildlife, pets & people. Most screenwash labels don't list ingredients let alone a hazard warning.

MP's write back they don't know who is responsible. It is time it was discussed in Parliament!
